text: Kare-ra wa chijo o tabi shite, kansatsu shinakatta no ka. Kare-ra izen no mono no ketsumatsu ga dodeatta ka o. Kare-ra (horobosa reta min) wa, korera (makka no tashinkyo to) yori mo tasu de,-ryoku mo sugure, chijo no iseki mo oi. Soredemo, kare-ra no kaseida koto wa, nani no yaku ni mo tatanakatta
